description.@en: Jolly mortals, fill your glasses, let us drink and be merry . . .

criticalFailure.@en: Everyone who drinks is immediately Intoxicated for six hours.

criticalSuccess.@en: You can also affect an entire barrel of alcohol.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, anyone who drinks the alcohol gains +10% Base Chance to Skill Tests to withstand Stress, Fear and Terror.

reagents.@en: A pitcher of alcohol that you touch before singing a song
